page.title: 10FARMING N.BEDS/SW CAMBS cont
page.content: {GRAIN VARIETIES}_ WHEAT- basically 10 types including "avalon" for biscuits; "Brigand" & "Longbow" for animal feed; "Copain" for bread. BARLEY - 8 kinds including "Golden Promise" & "Triumph" for beer; "Ingri" a winter barley for animal feed. Constant change of variety needed to combat disease. {MACHINERY IN USE} Corndrills; grain - driers; tractors; crop_sprayers; Combine Harvesters;sugar-beet cutters;corn-loaders etc. Costs are high _ a new M.F. Combine Harvester costs Â£80,000. Running the grain-drier costs Â£10 per hour. Calculators but not computers are used in farm offices. {LABOUR}Mostly family. Decline in number of farm labourers. Use of agricultural students for harvesting plus casual workers.
